ISSUE.TITLE: Add a way to create specific IConfig settings in plugins
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.60 Right now we can create any `IConfig` settings in the core and they will automatically be registered and bound. We should find a way to create such `IConfig` settings in plugins so that they are also automatically registered when the app starts.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #7143 Added a way to create specific IConfig settings in plugins
